MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Minnigaf affecting properties in Riverbank and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on an underground cable fault, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.39pm on 19th February 2021.
